scripts.build:analyze: cd client && ANALYZE=true npm run build
scripts.test: npm run test:unit && npm run test:integration
scripts.fresh-start: npm run clean && npm install && cd client && npm install
scripts.cost:monitor: aws ce get-cost-and-usage --time-period Start=$(date -d '1 month ago' +%Y-%m-01),End=$(date +%Y-%m-%d) --granularity MONTHLY --metrics BlendedCost
scripts.cost:alarm: aws cloudwatch put-metric-alarm --alarm-name PlanningPokerCost --alarm-description 'Alert when costs exceed $5' --metric-name EstimatedCharges --namespace AWS/Billing --statistic Maximum --period 86400 --threshold 5 --comparison-operator GreaterThanThreshold --evaluation-periods 1 --dimensions Name=Currency,Value=USD
